command: $comment = @{ postId=1; name="Alex D."; email="alex.designer.persona@example.org"; body="Great insights on brand consistency—thanks for sharing!" } | ConvertTo-Json; Invoke-RestMethod -Method Post -Uri "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/comments" -ContentType "application/json; charset=UTF-8" -Body $comment | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 5
explanation: Generates social interactions (comments) to seed normal-looking engagement patterns for the persona.
rationale_steps: Create a comment payload matching the persona’s voice and expertise.
POST to a test endpoint to simulate social engagement and receive structured JSON.
